episode.content: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
episode.description: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, two dance-and-vocal groups: FANTASTICS from EXILE TRIBE and SUPER DRAGON. They're both generating a buzz, and they're both coming to chat and perform.
